name: Lucy Loves Lemonade
description:
Lucy Loves Lemonade

She wants to drink it all the time, as much as possible, especially on hot summer days.
But  lemonade attracts wasps. Don't get stung!

A simple arcade game for Trijam 178 (Theme: Get that thing away from me!)

Credits:

Code and graphics by Kwikrick

Music by Gruber.  Get it from: Toy Box Jam 3 https://itch.io/jam/toy-box-jam-3

Made with Pico-8 (pico-8.com)
